cause.description:
On April 28th, 2007 at 5 pm Leah Marie Karp was on her way to her Aunt's house in Cleveland and was hit and killed by a drunk driver. This cause is to raise money for the Walk Like MADD walk in Cincinnati, OH on Saturday Oct. 18th, 2008.
1. Stop college students from drinking and driving.
2. Help the community understand the dangers of drinking and driving.
3. Raise money in memory of a friend who left this world at 20 years old and never got a chance to live her dreams.
cause.mission: Raise money for MADD's walk in Cincinnati on Saturday, October 18, 2008
cause.name: Walk Like MADD
